Name: Name
lblTitle1: A quick way to send your money faster
lblTitle2: Benefit now from Sadad electronic payment solutions
lblTitle3: Easy payment processing for your business
lblTitle6: Benefit now from Sadad electronic payment solutions
PackagesSubscriptionsPaymentDesc1: When it comes to payments, we have you covered. Sadad provides a range of solutions designed to provide greater convenience, accessibility and quality when making financial transactions. Payment for your packages and subscriptions is easier than ever with Sadad autopay.
PackagesSubscriptionsPaymentDesc2: Choose a package or subscription, set up payment through your bank account and never have to worry about making a payment again! There is no need to stand in line at the service center – make payments from the comfort of your home.
PackagesSubscriptionsPaymentDesc3: With Sadad auto pay, you can set up monthly debit and credit card transactions without having to worry about forgetting or missing a payment. Simply set up your payment and enjoy the ease and convenience of autopay!
InstallsPaymentDesc1: Sadad lets merchants create their own installment policies, allowing customers to pay in full or split payments into flexible installments with added interest. Sadad’s technology enables a massive reduction in costs through automation and assists merchants to work seamlessly with a successful installment plan.
InstallsPaymentDesc2: Sadad is a fast, innovative and reliable tool for setting up an installment policy. With Sadad you can customize your installment policies and implement them automatically. This technology allows you to significantly reduce costs and help you build a bigger customer base and profits.
InstallsPaymentDesc3: What you need, for how long and when you can pay. These are questions that Sadad helps answer.
RealestatePaymentDesc1: Are you tired of sending payments to the bank and waiting in line to pay your bills? With Sadad you can pay for your properties and manage your payments with ease. No more waiting in long lines and dealing with inconvenient payment methods! Sadad allows you to make all payments online with a variety of payment options, safeguards, and security systems.
RealestatePaymentDesc2: Using Sadad, you can easily track your income and expenses, manage your properties and set the right payment schedules. You have the ability to monitor payments and activate or deactivate contracts as needed. You can also see reports and receive notifications on any updates. For example, receive a notification when a tenant’s contract is expiring soon so you can plan ahead of time. Sadad allows you to manage all aspects of your real estate business with confidence!
RealestatePaymentDesc3: Sadad is the perfect solution for Real Estate Companies, Property Managers and Landlords to manage online payments, accounting, reporting and payments of all their properties. Sadad users see their revenue increase with seamless automation of their day-to-day activities.
PointOfSaleDesc1: Sadad Point-of-Sale (POS) online payment solution enables merchants to accept card payments in a secure, safe and convenient manner. Sadad POS enables merchants to reach customers without boundaries, reduce risks and costs associated with cash handling, track transactions in real-time and manage everything through one financial management system.
PointOfSaleDesc2: Discover prime opportunities to grow your business and reach a wide range of customers in Kuwait. Accept card payments at any point through the payment cycle, thus improving your conversion and increasing sales.
PointOfSaleDesc3: Sadad has made it easier than ever before to accept payments in your retail outlets. Reach out to more customers and offer multiple payment options right at the POS. No need to visit a bank or wait for a transaction to be processed.
PaymentGatewayDesc1: Sadad renowned online payment processor, ensures all payments are secure and confidential. Sadad Payment Gateway Solution is an online payment solution that enables you to accept debit, credit and other forms of payments with ease. The encrypted payment gateway allows you to accept customer payments without having to store customer information in your database,
PaymentGatewayDesc2: making it the most secure option for banks, healthcare companies, universities and other organizations dealing with sensitive data.Sadad payment gateway allows you to accept payments from debit, credit cards and more! You can integrate the gateway with your web application, Android or iOS using our plugins and SDKs. Sadad is an online payment solution that allows customers to pay seamlessly and securely on various online platforms. Sadad can process Visa, MasterCard and other forms of payment with minimal effort. It also supports Arabic languages across the board and allows you to accept payments in multiple currencies (including SAR, USD, AED, EURO). Our teams will have your integration ready in no time.
PaymentGatewayDesc3: With sadad, you get a fully-featured tool that can let you and your customers focus on the business.
FastLink: Sadad provides electronic payment solutions for various sectors and commercial activities, linking you and your customers.
Address: Kuwait - Jibla - Plot 13 - Thanian ElGhanem - Jibla Building 8 - 1st Floor - Office 7
MakeUseSada: Take advantage of SADAD solutions for payment
ServicesDesc: Pioneers of financial technology, Sadad provides high-tech, yet easy to use financial solutions that are revolutionizing Kuwait’s financial industry. To serve our customers better, we continue to innovate and constantly adapt to the ever changing technological world. Our first-rate customer service along with our state of the art digital experience, allows us to constantly elevate customer satisfaction!
ProcessPayment: Easy payment processing for your business
InstantBillingDesc1: Invoice customers, send invoice reminders, and get paid faster. Sadad Instant Billing is a complete billing solution for any business. Just add your company details, choose a professional invoice template and start creating invoices instantly. Branded invoices with your logo and color scheme.Online payments allow customers to pay anywhere, anytime with bank cards and more.
InstantBillingDesc2: Accept credit card payments directly on invoices sent to Kuwait customers.Invoices are automatically synced to your account records.Easy-to-use invoice template editor makes it easy to update your layout and add your company logos.Get paid faster with automatic payment reminders that you can customize in a few clicks.Accept partial payments, quickly send out an updated invoice showing the balance due and get paid faster.
InstantBillingDesc3: With Sadad Instant Billing, you can get paid fast with online invoices. You’ll save time by paying and tracking bills in Sadad instead of spending hours every month manually creating and mailing invoices. You can even see who’s viewed or paid your invoices.
SecurityPrivacyDesc: Your banking information is private and safe with us! We do not share customer data with any third party and our website is protected by SSL security certificate. All your banking transactions are encrypted while they are in transit to our server. We give you the tools to control what we know about you, and how we use it.
CompletePaymentSolutionDesc: Complete Payment Solution! With Sadad, you can accept both local GCC and international payment cards. When customers use any card for payment, you will receive the money in your registered bank account in a few working days. Join thousands of companies using Sadad to grow their businesses!
MobileApplicationDesc: With the launch of the Sadad mobile application, we are delighted to offer an innovative solution that makes life even easier. Now you have more control over your money anytime and anywhere with just a few touches on your smartphone.
PackagePayment: Organizing electronic payment for packages and subscriptions
Message1: Using Sadad eased my mind. I was always stressed about payments due and finding the time to pay them, but now I’m grateful to find this application.
Message2: I don’t usually write reviews but Sadad deserves it. I really appreciate how easy it is to use and how much it helped my small business grow. I can’t wait for more upgrades.
Message3: My retail shop is up and running thanks to Sadad. Ever since I started using online cash payments, more and more customers are now shopping at my store. Love what technology can do today!
Message4: I only recently started Sadad and looove it. I use it to pay my rent and I can’t tell you how nice it is avoiding the trouble of going to the bank for something so small.
Message5: It’s light, its easy and its on my phone. I literally pay for anything and everything with a click of a button. Can’t wait to see what the future finance tech is going to be like in a matter of a few years.
SadadIsSolution: Sadad is an online payment solution designed to help you grow!
SadadIsSolutionDesc: Here at Sadad, you are the priority and we want to help you facilitate your online payments with a simple and straightforward payment process. Whatever service you need, our fast and efficient customer support team is here to help you at every step.
ControlPaymentSadadApp: Control your payments with Sadad mobile application.
TriedBeforeDesc: Our most important customers who trusted us and all our distinguished services provided by us to facilitate the processes of making payments.
FAQDesc: Browse our FAQ, to find the answer to your question quickly.
FAQTitle2: Who can register in Sadad Pay?
FAQTitle4: Do I need credit in my account to be able to subscribe to Sadad Pay?
FAQTitle5: Where can I use Sadad Pay?
FAQTitle6: How are my payments and my information safe with Sadad?
FAQDesc1: Sadad is an electronic payment solutions company that suits the nature and size of all projects. Sadad can provide you the opportunities to penetrate the online commercial world and attain a larger share of clients with ease.
FAQDesc2: All entrepreneurs and business owners including profitable and non-profit organizations can subscribe to Sadad Pay through the website or smartphone application and benefit from all the services provided by Sadad Pay, such as sending payment links and others through a secure and flexible system.
FAQDesc3: All you have to do is register and open an account for your project on the Sadad Pay website or mobile application and use all the services and tools provided to help you manage your business better.
FAQDesc4: We, Sadad Pay, connect project owners with electronic payment systems and payment gateways to enable them to enter the field of e-commerce.Sadad Pay is not a funding company or an electronic wallet.  Therefore, you can subscribe to Sadad Pay by using your business’s bank account and Sadad Pay does not need any balance in your account.
FAQDesc5: You can use Sadad Pay anywhere, anytime. Through our mobile application, you would have the tools to send SMS messages and create invoices with a click on a button.
FAQDesc6: Sadad prevents consumer data from ending up in the wrong hands with data encryption. Sadad is not keeping customer's credit or debit card information. We use leading technology to keep your information safe and private. At Sadad, we take your safety with the utmost seriousness.
